body: Would it make sense for this to be called `Gradients` instead of `AddGradients`? (We don't call the other `Op` implementations `AddConstant` or `AddMatMul`)
body_html: Would it make sense for this to be called Gradients instead of AddGradients? (We don't call the other Op implementations AddConstant or AddMatMul)
